sources.title: As A Prelude To Fear | Full Movie | Mystery Survival Thriller
sources.description:
As A Prelude To Fear - When a young girl is kidnapped and imprisoned in a dungeon-like basement, the police believe it is the work of the notorious Pied Piper.
2022.  Stars: Francis Magee, Lara Lemon, Jamie Langlands

metadata.Plot: When a young girl called Eve gets kidnapped and imprisoned in a dungeon-like basement, the police believe it is the work of the notorious Pied Piper.
metadata.Writer: Jacob Coen, Steph Du Melo, Roger Wyatt
